meanings.sent1: She vendu her old bike to buy a new one.
meanings.sent2: The store vendu all its products during the sale.

meanings.definition: A person who has sold something
meanings.sent1: The vendu happily handed over the keys to the new owner.
meanings.sent2: After the successful sale, she became a vendu.
